full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 367 Filed 10/22/21 Page 31 of 35 Juror ID: ____________ DECLARATION I, ____________ (juror number) declare under penalty of perjury that the foregoing answers set forth in this Jury Questionnaire are true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief.
